control.description-key: Multiple selector for several records and insert in a string

property.name: field
property.description-key: Field to be populated with the selected values

property.name: entityName
property.description-key: Name of the entity from which you want to return results

property.name: data
property.description-key: Data field from request to be inserted in field

property.name: attributeid
property.description-key: Schema name for the main field of the entity you want to retrieve

property.name: filter
property.description-key: Query to filter the results to return.

property.name: filterDynamicValues
property.description-key: Fields from the record entity to filter your query split by comma.

property.name: columns
property.description-key: Columns to be displayed in the list with the following syntax: DisplayName,fieldName;Name,name;Age,age

property.name: headerVisible
property.description-key: Is the header of the columns visible for the list?

property.name: openFormOptions
property.display-name-key: How do you want to open the form?
property.description-key: How do you want to open the form when you click the record?

property.name: populatedFieldVisible
property.description-key: Is the field that gets populated visible?

property.name: filterTags
property.description-key: Do you want to filter the tags?

property.name: recordsToBeReturned
property.display-name-key: Amount of records to be shown as maximum
property.description-key: Set the number of records to be shown in the list as maximum. By default 50
